definitions.definition: A polycyclic heterocycle consisting of two benzene rings fused to one of thiazine ; thiodiphenylamine , dibenzothiazine
Any of a family of pharmaceuticals , derived from this compound, used to treat schizophrenia etc.

main_definition: ( organic chemistry ) A polycyclic heterocycle consisting of two benzene rings fused to one of thiazine ; thiodiphenylamine , dibenzothiazine
secondary_definitions: ( medicine ) Any of a family of pharmaceuticals , derived from this compound, used to treat schizophrenia etc.
